name: DrawGuess
description:
Players prompt each other with a word to draw. They pass on the drawing to the next player to guess, and the game goes on. In this chain of drawing and guessing, enjoy the hilarious transformations!

The game establishes a group voice call making it a great way to connect with friends and family. Whether you are having a house party, hanging out remotely with friends, or breaking the ice on a team, DrawGuess is truly the best game 😎

How to play?
- Players start by adding a secret phrase to their sketchbook and pass it on.
- The next person draws it and passes on to their next, to guess.
- This continues till everyone gets back their sketchbook.
- The hilarious transformations are then showcased!

Note: With even number of players, a player chooses a secret phrase, draws it and then passes on.
